text:
[Verse]
Drops fall down my window
Feet begin to slide slow
World spins in a hazy glow
Feel the rhythm as I go

[Verse 2]
Splashing puddles under moonlight
Every step feels just right
Heartbeats sync with the night
Lose myself in the sight

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Dancing in the rain
Joy without refrain
Dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Laughing loud with no fear
Spinning round with you near
Music in the atmosphere
Pure bliss it's so clear

[Bridge]
No umbrella no need
Freedom's all we feed
Every drop a good seed
Let the raindrops lead

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Dancing in the rain
Joy without refrain
Dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
